summary: Adds circlets to the Jewelery Forging list.
descriptionHtml:
Normally you can\'t craft circlets but this mod corrects that \"oversight\". After installing this mod a number of circlets will be avaiable to create in the Jewelery Forging list. I\'ve taken a few liberties with what the required ingredients are as what would be needed for some of the circlets don\'t exist in the game (copper, onyx, jade)

The following circlet recipes are added:[list][*]Copper Moonstone - Dwarven Metal Ingot, 3 Moonstone Ore
[*]Copper Onyx - Dwarven Metal Ingot, 3 Ebony Ore
[*]Copper Ruby - Dwarven Metal Ingot, 1 Flawless Ruby, 2 Ruby
[*]Copper Sapphire - Dwarven Metal Ingot, Flawless Sapphire, 2 Sapphire
[*]Gold Ruby - Gold Ingot, Flawless Ruby, 2 Ruby
[*]Gold Emerald - Gold Ingot, Flawless Emerald, 2 Emerald
[*]Jade Emerald - Refined Malachite, Flawless Emerald, 2 Emerald
[*]Jade Sapphire - Refined Malachite, Flawless Sapphire, 2 Sapphire
[*]Silver Moonstone - Silver Ingot, 3 Moonstone Ore
[*]Silver Sapphire - Silver Ingot, Flawless Sapphire, 2 Sapphire
[/list]

Special Thanks to Samutz on the Bethsoft forums whos [url=http://forums.bethsoft.com/topic/1286593-tutorial-making-new-smithing-recipes-pre-ck/]guide (http://forums.bethsoft.com/topic/1286593-tutorial-making-new-smithing-recipes-pre-ck/)[/url] was invaluable in making this small mod.
author: Monochrome Wench
